pageProduct.name: Thompsons Salmon Oil Plus 1000mg 500 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Salmon Oil Plus low odour formula to support heart health and brain function.

Thompson's Salmon Oil Plus is a high quality, low odour formula that combines sustainably sourced natural Fish Oils from salmon (70%), anchovies and sardines (30%) which is regularly tested for mercury, lead and PCBs and does not use artificially
concentrated Fish Oil. It is also a source of Omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA, which can help to modulate inflammatory responses in the body.

Size: 500caps

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support cardiovascular health, brain function and general wellbeing
• Low reflux formula
• Rich source of Omega-3 fatty acids
• High quality product that does not use artificially concentrated Fish Oil
• Only contains sustainably sourced fish
• Regularly tested for mercury, lead and PCBs

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Use only as directed and always read the label. Contains natural orange oil.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains: Fish Oil-Natural 1g (1000mg)
equiv. Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA) 180mg
equiv. Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) 120mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
